mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT dict_sort,asset_status FROM (SELECT a2.dict_label,a2.dict_sort,a1.asset_status FROM sys_zcb a1 INNER JOIN sys_dict_data a2 ON a1.asset_status=a2.dict_value WHERE a2.dict_type='sys_zcb_assetStatus' AND a1.del_flag='0') as temp ORDER BY dict_sort

SELECT SUM(t2.total_price) AS collateralTotal,t1.asset_package_name,t1.id,t1.del_flag,t1.evaluation_time,SUM(t2.cap_value) as capValue,t1.team_members_name,t1.team_members_id,t1.asset_status FROM sys_zcb t1 LEFT JOIN sys_zck t2 ON t1.id=t2.zcb_id WHERE t1.del_flag='0' AND t2.del_flag='0' and t1.asset_status = #{assetStatus} and t1.team_members_id like concat('%',#{teamMembersId},'%')
and t1.asset_package_name like concat('%', #{assetPackageName}, '%')
GROUP BY t1.id
